title: UX/UI Designer
description:
SparkVibe Studio Seeks a UX/UI Designer (Full-Time)

SparkVibe Studio, a Vancouver-based digital design agency, creates user-centric experiences for clients in tech, education, and e-commerce. We’re excited to welcome a talented UX/UI Designer to our team to craft intuitive and visually stunning interfaces.

Role Overview
You’ll design user experiences and interfaces that delight users and meet client objectives. Working with product managers, developers, and clients, you’ll shape digital products from concept to launch.

Key Responsibilities
- Create wireframes and prototypes using Figma or Adobe XD.
- Conduct user research to understand needs and behaviors.
- Design responsive interfaces for web and mobile platforms.
- Collaborate with developers to ensure design fidelity.
- Perform usability testing to refine designs.
- Develop style guides and design systems.
- Optimize designs for accessibility and performance.
- Stay updated on UX/UI trends and tools.
- Present design concepts to clients and stakeholders.
- Support cross-functional teams in product development.

Qualifications Needed
We seek candidates with 3–5 years of experience in UX/UI design, proficient in Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch. Strong user research and usability testing skills are essential, along with knowledge of accessibility standards. Excellent collaboration and communication abilities are required. A Bachelor’s degree in design, HCI, or a related field is necessary.

Why SparkVibe?
We’re a creative team that values innovation and collaboration. Our hybrid work environment offers flexibility, with opportunities for remote and in-office work. We support your growth through workshops, certifications, and access to design tools. You’ll work on diverse projects that push the boundaries of digital design.

Benefits
Health, dental, and vision insurance
RRSP matching program
20 days of annual leave
Professional development budget
Access to design software
Team-building events and wellness programs

Join Our Studio
If you’re passionate about creating user-focused designs, apply now to join SparkVibe Studio!
